thread.title: Kenya's Chumba, Kiplagat win titles at Chicago Marathon

title: Kenya's Chumba, Kiplagat win titles at Chicago Marathon
text:
Kenya's Chumba, Kiplagat win titles at Chicago Marathon Runners participate in the Chicago Marathon, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) Search Help
